00019 template <typename T> 
00020 std::string AddCommas(T data) { 
00021   std::stringstream ss; ss << data; std::string s = ss.str();
00022   if (s.length() > 3)
00023      for (int i = s.length()-3; i > 0; i -= 3)
00024        s.insert(i,",");
00025    return s;
00026 }

00028 using std::ifstream;
00029 inline bool existTest (const std::string& name) {
00030   ifstream f(name.c_str());
00031   if (f.good()) {
00032     f.close();
00033     return true;
00034   } else {
00035     f.close();
00036     return false;
00037   }   
00038 }

00054 inline void displayRuntime(const timespec start) {
00055 
00056   struct timespec finish;
00057   clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, &finish);
00058   double elapsed = (finish.tv_sec - start.tv_sec);
00059   int t = clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00060   int min = (int)floor(elapsed / 60.0);
00061   int sec = (int)(elapsed-min*60);
00062   char buffer[100];
00063   sprintf (buffer, "CPU: %4dm%02ds Wall: %4dm%02ds", 
00064             (int)floor( ((double)t) /60.0), t % 60, min, sec);
00065   printf ("%s",buffer);
00066 }
00067 
00068 inline void rcomplement(std::string &a) {
00069 
00070   std::reverse(&a[0], &a[a.size()]);
00071   std::string::iterator it = a.begin();
00072   for (; it != a.end(); it++)
00073     if (*it == 'A')
00074       *it = 'T';
00075     else if (*it == 'T')
00076       *it = 'A';
00077     else if (*it == 'C')
00078       *it = 'G';
00079     else
00080       *it = 'C';
00081 }

00083   // calculate the percentage
00084  template <typename T> inline int percentCalc(T numer, T denom) {
00085    if (denom <= 0)
00086      return 0;
00087    int perc  = static_cast<int>(floor((float)numer / (float)denom * 100.0));
00088    return perc;
00089  }

00091  // remove the last character from a string
00092  inline std::string cutLastChar(std::string in) {
00093    if (in.length() == 0)
00094      return in;
00095    else 
00096      return in.substr(0, in.length() - 1);
00097  }

00099  // remove substrings from a string
00100  inline std::string scrubString(std::string toscrub, std::string toremove) {
00101    std::string::size_type i = toscrub.find(toremove);
00102    while (i != std::string::npos) {
00103      toscrub.erase(i, toremove.length());
00104      i = toscrub.find(toremove);
00105    }
00106    return toscrub;
00107  }

00109  // get a file name + extension
00110  // https://www.safaribooksonline.com/library/view/c-cookbook/0596007612/ch10s16.html
00111  inline std::string getFileName(const std::string& s) {
00112 
00113    char sep = '/';
00114 
00115    #ifdef _WIN32
00116      sep = '\\';
00117    #endif
00118 
00119    size_t i = s.rfind(sep, s.length());
00120    if (i != std::string::npos && ( (i+1) < s.length()) ) {
00121      return(s.substr(i+1, s.length()));
00122    }
00123 
00124    return(s);
00125  }
